document.full_text: mike huckabee, who won the 2008 g.o.p. caucus in iowa, said he would not seek republican presidential nomination, choosing to continue his broadcast career.
document.title: after hinting otherwise, huckabee says he won't run for president
lines_and_colors: mike huckabee, who won the 2008 g.o.p. caucus in iowa, said he would not seek republican presidential nomination, choosing to continue his broadcast career.
